props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: as
props.docblock: Specifies base element for the component.

description.text: Specifies base element for the component.

props.name: controlId
props.docblock:
Specifies id to use in the group, it will be used as `htmlFor` in `FormLabel` and as `id` in input components.
 Will be autogenerated if none is supplied.

description.text:
Specifies id to use in the group, it will be used as `htmlFor` in `FormLabel` and as `id` in input components.
 Will be autogenerated if none is supplied.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock: Specifies whether to display components in invalid state, this affects styling.

description.text: Specifies whether to display components in invalid state, this affects styling.

props.name: isValid
props.docblock: Specifies whether to display components in valid state, this affects styling.

description.text: Specifies whether to display components in valid state, this affects styling.
